SELECT
FROM gzusu_manager_goods_info
WHERE GOODS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR GOODS_LENDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR GOODS_RETURNER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by UPDATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{startNum},#{size}

SELECT COUNT(g.ID) FROM ( SELECT
FROM gzusu_manager_goods_info
WHERE GOODS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR GOODS_LENDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR GOODS_RETURNER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
